headline: PTC Launches AI-Powered FlexPLM Capabilities at NRF 2026
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced new artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities for its FlexPLM® retail product lifecycle management (PLM) solution that automate tech pack creation, one of the most time-consuming and error-prone steps in retail product development. The new capabilities will debut at the National Retail Federation's (NRF) Retail's Big Show, January 11–13 in New York City.
